post_detail.description: Working closely with MTV Directors Seyi Peter-Thomas and Barry Flanagan, Mark Szumski helped scope a variety of visual effects shots for the day-long Phantom camera shoot in order to capture as much in camera for embellishing in post.  Once the spots were cut- ranging from a 2-minute short down to a 30 second promos- each piece had final color tweaking, environmental effects such as sparks, smoke, lighting, sky tweaks and replacement, and time warping.
post_detail.title: Hard Times of RJ Berger
